scripts.build: node scripts/copy-bootstrap-icons.js && npm run optimize-images && NODE_ENV=production npm run optimize-css && next build && node scripts/fix-asset-paths.js
scripts.build:gh-pages: node scripts/copy-bootstrap-icons.js && npm run optimize-images && NODE_ENV=production npm run optimize-css && NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 next build && node scripts/fix-asset-paths.js
scripts.export: node scripts/copy-bootstrap-icons.js && npm run optimize-images && NODE_ENV=production npm run optimize-css && next build && node scripts/fix-asset-paths.js
scripts.deploy: node scripts/copy-bootstrap-icons.js && npm run optimize-images && STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 NODE_ENV=production next build && node scripts/fix-asset-paths.js && node scripts/post-static-deploy.js
scripts.deploy:perf: node scripts/copy-bootstrap-icons.js && npm run optimize-images && STATIC_EXPORT=true NODE_ENV=production npm run optimize-css && STATIC_EXPORT=true NEXT_DISABLE_ESLINT=1 NODE_ENV=production next build && node scripts/fix-asset-paths.js && node scripts/post-static-deploy.js
scripts.optimize: npm run optimize-images && npm run optimize-css:prod
